name: Bottle Flip 2K17 Voxel - Impossible Tricky Shot
name_original: Bottle Flip 2K17 Voxel - Impossible Tricky Shot
description:
WBF 2K17 Voxel Edition is here! The official water bottle flip sports game.

Test your bottle flipping skills by landing it perfectly on the target.
____________________________________________

• 50 different levels
• Endless mode
• Multiple characters
• Simple one-tap gameplay for all ages
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!

For more latest news and updates on #WBF2K17, follow us here:
